element.name: a
element.attributecategories: aria, conditional processing, core, global event, graphical event, presentation, style, deprecated xlink
element.x:contentmodel: Descriptive content, plus any element or text allowed by its parent's content model, except for another a element. If the parent is a switch element, use the content model of the nearest ancestor that isn't a switch.

element.name: mesh
element.attributecategories: aria, conditional processing, core, global event, graphical event, presentation
element.x:contentmodel: Any number of animation elements, descriptive elements, 'mask element', 'clipPath', 'marker element', 'script', and 'style element' elements, along with zero or one 'meshgradient' element.

element.x:contentmodel: Any number of descriptive elements, 'script' and from two to four 'stop' elements.
